mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `LIKE` (USER_ID, REFERENCE_TYPE, REFERENCE_ID, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{referenceType}, #{referenceId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT l.USER_ID, u.USER_NICKNAME, u.USER_IMAGE, l.CREATED_AT FROM `LIKE` l INNER JOIN USERS u ON l.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE l.REFERENCE_TYPE = #{referenceType} AND l.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} ORDER BY l.CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{limit}
